title: Kaitlynn Carter hints at Miley Cyrus heartache in response to troll
text:
Kaitlynn’s still coping with her recent break-up (Picture: Splash News; Kaitlynn Carter/Instagram)

It appears Kaitlynn Carter is still coming to terms with her split from Miley Cyrus as she’s hinted about going through heartache while responding to a troll who commented on her weight.

The Hills: New Beginning star split from Miley, 26, in September after just two months of dating, despite the pair appearing to be loved-up just days before.

However just a month before she began dating Miley, Kaitlynn split from her husband Brody Jenner after a year of marriage.

On Tuesday, Kaitlynn took some time out for herself to relax in Palm Springs, California and shared an Instagram photo showing her reclining on a sun lounger wearing a two-piece hot pink bikini.

‘In real life,’ the blogger captioned the snap.

However, one of Kaitlynn’s followers decided to body-shame the star and commented that she looked ‘too thin’.

The troll added: ‘It seems like the new norm is being shown as super thin is only exceptional.’

Referring to her string of personal troubles, Kaitlynn replied: ‘I mean I been through some s**t lately LOL.’

Earlier this month, it was reported that Miley decided to end her whirlwind romance with Kaitlynn, 31, as it was moving too fast.

The pair had quietly struck up a romance and photos of them cuddling on holiday in Lake Como, Italy, emerged a day after Miley announced her split from husband Liam Hemsworth.

Sources claim the Wrecking Ball singer realised she wasn’t ready to hop back into another committed relationship so soon after ending her marriage with Liam, whom she wed in December.

Although she’s now dating longtime friend Cody Simpson and is reported to have moved in with him.

Sharing an insight into her break-up from Kaitlynn, a source told People at the time: ‘Miley doesn’t want a serious relationship. She and Kaitlynn spent every day together and it just wasn’t anything that Miley wanted to continue doing.’

Kaitlynn previously hinted at her state of mind regarding the Miley split with a cryptic post that read: ‘I may never know/understand what someone is going through but I always choose to look at other’s behaviour from a place of love and respect and compassion and be kind no matter what.’
